mapper.select: SELECT id, dept_id AS deptId, rank_id AS rankId, account, name, birth, gender, phone, email, des, joined_at, approved_at, access, del_fl, password FROM emp WHERE account = #{account}
SELECT account, e.name as name, r.name as rankId, d.name as deptId, birth, gender, email, access, approved_at FROM emp e JOIN dept d on d.id = e.dept_id JOIN `rank` r on r.id = e.rank_id

SELECT account, e.name as name, r.name as rankId, d.name as deptId, birth, gender, email, access, approved_at FROM emp e JOIN dept d on d.id = e.dept_id JOIN `rank` r on r.id = e.rank_id WHERE access = 1 AND account = #{account}
